q: Give a title to start this thought log.
On a scale of 0 to 10, how distressed were you?
Select words that best reflect how you were feeling at the time.
What was your immediate thought to the situation or event?
What is an alternative explanation? How would you change the thought?
On a scale of 0 to 10, how distressed do you feel now after exploring your thought?
Select words that best describe how you are feeling now.
Awesome, you completed your thought log!
